data.system_settings: Windows 10 Pro x64 v1803 Firefox Nightly v63.0a1
data.actual_result: It redirects to the English support page
data.expected_result: The link corresponds to the selected language like the top nav bar does.
data.short_description: [Website Bug] Support links do not correspond to the selected language except in the top navigation bar
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the Discord website - Click on a link to the support page that is not in the top nav bar (the community guidelines page or the link in the bottom nav bar)
